content: --दर्शन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} pleasing to look at, of pleasing appearance, good-looking, lovely, handsome; अहो प्रियदर्शनः कुमारः <ls>U. 5</ls>; <ls>R. 1. 47</ls>; <ls>Ś. 3. 10</ls>; एवमुत्सुकोऽपि प्रियदर्शनो देवः <ls>Ś. 6.</ls> (--नः {1} a parrot. {2} a kind of date tree. {3} <ab>N.</ab> of a prince of the Gandharvas; <ls>R. 5. 53.</ls> (--नं the sight of a beloved object; <ls>Pt. 1. 128.</ls>
